## ParticleMaterial.vertexShader() method

Vertex shader hook.

Responsibilities: - Derives per-vertex billboard position in world space based on: - particle position (`texCoord0`<!-- -->), params (`texCoord1`<!-- -->), and velocity (`texCoord2`<!-- -->). - `params` uniform: x=jitter power, y=aspect scale, z=directional flag. - Builds a right/up basis aligned with either view or velocity. - Computes UVs based on vertex ID (quad corners). - Outputs `zUV`<!-- -->, `worldPos`<!-- -->, and `zParticleParams`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
vertexShader(scope: PBFunctionScope): void;
```
